The Problem

Stop settling for "Break/Fix" support.

Most MSPs operate on a broken model: they profit when you have problems. They stick a band-aid on issues and bill you for the service call.

The Old Way (Break/Fix)

  • × Unpredictable hourly bills
  • × Slow response times
  • × "Band-aid" solutions

The Humaneers Way

Incentives aligned with your uptime.

We operate on a subscription model. We only profit when your systems are running perfectly, so we work overtime to prevent issues before they happen.

100% US-Based Helpdesk

No offshore call centers. Talk to a US-based engineer who knows your business by name.

US-based engineering team.

Hybrid & Cloud Infrastructure

We secure on-prem servers or migrate you to the cloud (AWS/Azure) depending on your needs.

AWS/Azure certified architects.

Mobile Device Management (MDM)

Secure company data on personal phones without spying on your employees.

Automated patch management.

SOC 2 Type II Security

Enterprise-grade endpoint protection, DNS filtering, and 24/7 SOC monitoring included.

Behavioral AI analysis.

Remote & On-Site Support

99% of issues fixed remotely. For the other 1%, we dispatch engineers to any US zip code.

Next-business-day dispatch.

Zero-Touch Onboarding

We ship laptops pre-configured. New hires open the box and start working immediately.

Okta/Azure AD integration.

Nationwide Reach, Local Feel

Our Tempe, AZ headquarters is just the hub. We use advanced remote management tools to support clients in all 50 states.

Remote First

99% of tickets are resolved remotely via our secure agents. No waiting for a truck roll.

Logistics Handled

We ship pre-configured hardware directly to your employees' homes, anywhere in the US.

On-Site Dispatch

For hardware failures, we dispatch boots-on-the-ground technicians to any zip code within 24 hours.

Your Journey to IT Stability

01

Assessment & Roadmap

We scan your network, identify gaps, and build a 12-month stabilization plan.

02

Stabilization Sprint

We fix critical vulnerabilities, deploy security agents, and clean up messy cabling.

03

We monitor 24/7, handle all helpdesk tickets, and meet quarterly for strategy.
